Oliver George wrote:

>Hi Guys,
>
>I think this is a known issue, I can see references to it everywhere but
>I'm totally stumped on how to fix it.
>
>Basically, I have a functional junit tests... but it only works when I
>restart the JBoss enviroment.  If I undeploy/redeploy then I get a class
>cast exception.
>  
>

I'm guessing a class definition is changing during undeploy/redeploy. 
The test somehow holds on to the "old" class definition.  The use of 
"loading=false" may exaggerate this problem.  

Also remember that a class is unique by the tuple of its name and the 
class loader that loads it.

This may well not be the issue,

Mike
